snippet.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl — Come to Me Official Trailer
snippet.description: The new trailer of S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl is here. Featuring a huge, borderless open-world and a non-linear story, S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2 releases on Xbox Series X|S and PC in 2023. The game will be available day one with Xbox Game Pass.
